name: Olmec
description:
Travel through an ancient Temple in a search for your purpose. Olmec tells the 100% factual story of how the Ancient Olmec statue came to be. Dash and double jump your way through the Temple as you fend off the wildlife and avoid the bubbling lava.

This is only a short, single level prototype and was made for a university assignment.

Any questions please email me at: Jakecampbell105@gmail.com
